targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  sum((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceCurrentCost')::float) as current_cost,
  sum((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceRecommendedCost')::float) as recommended_cost,
  sum((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float) as savings
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE 
  api_endpoint = 'ec2-instance' AND 
  ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float > 0 or not($exclude_negative) ) AND
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956'))
  and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT 
  sum((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float) / sum((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceCurrentCost')::float) * 100.0 as saving_percentage
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE 
  api_endpoint = 'ec2-instance' AND 
  ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float > 0 or not($exclude_negative) ) and
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956'))
  and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT sum(current_cost) as current_cost, sum(recommended_cost) as recommended_cost, sum(savings) as savings FROM (
  SELECT *, max(id) over (partition by resource_id) as max_id FROM (
    SELECT 
      id,
      statistics ->> 'resourceID' as resource_id,
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceCurrentCost')::float) as current_cost,
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceRecommendedCost')::float) as recommended_cost,
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float) as savings
    FROM 
      usage_v2 
    WHERE 
      api_endpoint = 'ec2-instance' AND 
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float > 0 or not($exclude_negative) ) and
      not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956'))
      and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
  ) as t1
) as t2 where max_id = id

SELECT  sum(savings) / sum(current_cost) * 100.0 FROM (
  SELECT *, max(id) over (partition by resource_id) as max_id FROM (
    SELECT 
      id,
      statistics ->> 'resourceID' as resource_id,
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceCurrentCost')::float) as current_cost,
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceRecommendedCost')::float) as recommended_cost,
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float) as savings
    FROM 
      usage_v2 
    WHERE 
      api_endpoint = 'ec2-instance' AND 
      ((statistics ->> 'ec2InstanceSavings')::float > 0 or not($exclude_negative) ) and
      not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956'))
      and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
  ) as t1
) as t2 where max_id = id

  $__timeFilter(created_at)

    ((statistics ->> 'ebsSavings')::float > 0 or not($exclude_negative) ) AND

SELECT 
  sum((statistics ->> 'kubernetesCurrentCPU')::float) as current_cpu,
  sum((statistics ->> 'kubernetesRecommendedCPU')::float) as recommended_cpu,
  sum((statistics ->> 'kubernetesCPUSavings')::float) as savings
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE 
  api_endpoint like 'kubernetes-%' AND 
  ((statistics ->> 'kubernetesCPUSavings')::float > 0 or (not($exclude_negative) and (statistics ->> 'kubernetesCPUSavings')::float != 0) ) AND
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks'))
  and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT 
  sum((statistics ->> 'kubernetesCPUSavings')::float) / sum((statistics ->> 'kubernetesCurrentCPU')::float) * 100.0 as savings
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE

  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks'))
  and $__timeFilter(created_at)

  sum((statistics ->> 'kubernetesRecommendedMemoryRequest')::float) as recommended_memory,

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'accountID')) as accountID
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'orgEmail')) as organizations
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and
  not((statistics ->> 'orgEmail') like '%gmail.com%')
  and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'orgEmail')) as organizations
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and
  ((statistics ->> 'orgEmail') like '%gmail.com%')

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as ec2_instance
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and 
  api_endpoint = 'ec2-instance' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT sum(c) FROM (
SELECT
  distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID') as resource_id,
  (statistics ->> 'ebsVolumeCount')::integer as c
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956'))
and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
) as t

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as ec2_instance
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) AND
  api_endpoint = 'aws-rds' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as ec2_instance
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) AND
  api_endpoint = 'aws-rds-cluster' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
SELECT
  (statistics ->> 'accountID') as kubernetes_clusters,
  (statistics ->> 'auth0UserId') as auth0UserId
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks')) and 
  api_endpoint like 'kubernetes-%' and 
  $__timeFilter(created_at) 
group by 1,2
) as t

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as kubernetes_pods
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks')) and 
  api_endpoint = 'kubernetes-pod' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as kubernetes_deployments
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks')) and 
  api_endpoint = 'kubernetes-deployment' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as kubernetes_daemonset
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks')) and 
  api_endpoint = 'kubernetes-daemonset' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as kubernetes_statefulset
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks')) and 
  api_endpoint = 'kubernetes-statefulset' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  count(distinct(statistics ->> 'resourceID')) as kubernetes_jobs
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'kaytu-aks@local.temp', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks')) and 
  api_endpoint = 'kubernetes-job' and $__timeFilter(created_at)

SELECT
  (statistics ->> 'accountID') as accountID,
  count(*)
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
group by 1

SELECT
  (request -> 'identification' -> 'sts_arn') as identities,
  count(*),
  sum((statistics ->> 'savings')::float) as total_savings
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
group by 1

SELECT
  (statistics ->> 'orgEmail') as email,
  count(*),
  sum((statistics ->> 'savings')::float) as total_savings
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and
  ((statistics ->> 'orgEmail') like '%gmail.com%') 
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
group by 1

SELECT
  (statistics ->> 'orgEmail') as email,
  count(*),
  sum((statistics ->> 'savings')::float) as total_savings
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) and
  not((statistics ->> 'orgEmail') like '%gmail.com%')
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
  group by 1

SELECT 
  request -> 'cliVersion' as _version,
  count(*)
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', 'clusterUser_kaytu-development_kaytu-aks', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956'))
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
GROUP BY 1
order by 2 desc

SELECT
  date_trunc('day', created_at) AS time,
  count(*) AS daily_usage
FROM
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956'))
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
GROUP BY
  time
ORDER BY
  time

SELECT 
  id,
  request -> 'cliVersion' as _version,
  response -> 'rightSizing' -> 'current' ->> 'instanceType' as currentInstanceType,
  response -> 'rightSizing' -> 'recommended' ->> 'instanceType' as recommendedInstanceType,
  (statistics ->> 'savings')::float as savings
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE 
  api_endpoint = 'aws-rds' AND 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) AND
  (statistics ->> 'savings')::float < 0
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT 
  id,
  request -> 'cliVersion' as _version,
  response -> 'rightSizing' -> 'current' ->> 'instanceType' as currentInstanceType,
  response -> 'rightSizing' -> 'recommended' ->> 'instanceType' as recommendedInstanceType,
  (statistics ->> 'savings')::float as savings
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE 
  api_endpoint = 'aws-rds-cluster' AND 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) AND
  (statistics ->> 'savings')::float < 0
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT 
  id,
  request -> 'cliVersion' as _version,
  value -> 'Current' as currentInstanceType,
  value -> 'Recommended' as recommendedInstanceType,
  ((value -> 'Current' -> 'cost')::float - (value -> 'Recommended' -> 'cost')::float) as savings
FROM 
  usage_v2 cross join jsonb_each(response -> 'volumes')
WHERE 
  api_endpoint = 'ec2-instance' AND 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) AND
  (response ->> 'volumes') != 'null' AND 
  ((value -> 'Current' -> 'cost')::float - (value -> 'Recommended' -> 'cost')::float) < 0
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT 
  id,
  request -> 'cliVersion' as _version,
  response -> 'rightSizing' -> 'current' ->> 'instanceType' as currentInstanceType,
  response -> 'rightSizing' -> 'recommended' ->> 'instanceType' as recommendedInstanceType,
  (statistics ->> 'savings')::float as savings
FROM 
  usage_v2 
WHERE 
  api_endpoint = 'ec2-instance' AND 
  not(statistics ->> 'accountID' in ('', '435670955331', '169193410068', '495355942008', '193049167917', '517592840862', '955636408574', '963827789956')) AND
  (statistics ->> 'savings')::float < 0
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT 
  failure_message, count(*)
FROM 
  usage_v2
WHERE 
  not(failure_message is null)
  and $__timeFilter(created_at) 
group by 1
order by 2 desc
